message.name: ERR_BIREPORTCONFIGURATION_FV_REPORT_FILE_NAME
message.locale: Report file name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BIREPORTCONFIGURATION_FV_REPORT_HEIGHT_INVALID
message.locale: Height setting contains an invalid entry. Height must be expressed either as a positive number or else as a positive percentage up to 100 percent.

message.name: ERR_BIREPORTCONFIGURATION_FV_REPORT_WIDTH_INVALID
message.locale: Width setting contains an invalid entry. Width must be expressed either as a positive number or else as a positive percentage up to 100 percent.

message.name: ERR_BIREPORTCONFIGURATION_XRV_REPORT_DUPLICATE
message.locale: There are duplicate reports with name %1s.

message.name: ERR_BIREPORTCONFIGURATION_FV_REPORT_SERVLET_INVALID_SYMBOLS
message.locale: Report servlet contains one or more of the following invalid symbols %1s.
